attributes.action: Stop The BBC Axing The Series 'Last Of he Summer Wine'!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is understood that the BBC intend to terminate this series quite soon.
I am a Licence payer and I am not aware that any consultation has taken place with we (the viewing public), regarding the future of this very popular programme - Why?

rejection.details: Decisions on progamming are made by the BBC and not government. Please contact the BBC with your request.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
